magpie.models.regression

Class MixingRuleRegression

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.models.BaseModel
      • magpie.models.regression.BaseRegression
        • magpie.models.regression.MixingRuleRegression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, AbstractRegressionModel, Citable, Commandable, Options, Printable, Savable

    public class MixingRuleRegression
extends BaseRegression
    Predicts the class of a CompositionEntry based on the composition-weighted mean. Only works on datasets that fulfill CompositionDataset.

    Special features:

    • Can determine class based on the average of a property, or the average of its inverse (1/p = x_1/p_1 + ...).
    • Can "correct" weighted property using a linear model: class = a + b * meanProperty
    • Can fit elemental properties for a certain element

    Usage: <property> [-invert] [-correct] [-fit <ElementNames>]
    property: Name of property to use for mixing rule model
    -invert: Whether to compute the harmonic mean.
    -correct: Fit linear correction factors to mixing rule equation
    ElementNames: List elements whose elemental property should be fitted

    Implemented Print Commands:

    fitted - Print fitted elemental properties (if any)

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
